posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked: Hi guys I am learning how to use tube convertor feature in Onshape and when I press tube convertor it does not turn to what I want

posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked: No, should I? I created them at the same time.

posts.name: diego
posts.cooked: You must do this; it's extremely important.

posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked: IMPORTANTLY DO NOT OUTPUT ANYTHING BUT THE CLEANED VERSION (NO INTRODUCTION NO OTHER LITTLE EXPLENATION) JUST THE CLEANED PARAGRAPH THE TEXT IS THEN DO I HAVE TO MAKE 2 SKETCHES FOR THE EACH BOX

posts.name: diego
posts.cooked: No, do you have the extract individual feature scripts installed?

posts.name: diego
posts.cooked: If not, install the featurescripts mentioned here

posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked: This solved my problem, I really appreciate that!!!
Join our Discord server linked at the bottom of frcdesign.org’s homepage for faster support.

posts.name: Calvin Selin
posts.cooked: the tube converter thinks of every single body as needing to become its own tube if you only have one body it tries to make one tube out of it
